articles.title: Xbox Series X: Phil Spencer Says You Can't Even Appreciate The True Power Of Next-Gen Yet - GameSpot
articles.description: Phil Spencer says you might not appreciate how much better next-gen games are until you can "feel" the improvement that comes with 60 FPS.
